data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_f666faa5ec6be5353f10dcd1d8997a42.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Arlott possesses a demonic eye that will <font color="a6aafb">Mark</font> enemy units near Arlott that become affected by control effects for 7s.
The eye will also automatically <font color="a6aafb">Mark</font> a nearby enemy hero in vision every 7s.

Arlott swings his lance forward, dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and briefly stunning targets in an area. Targets hit by the further part of the AOE will be stunned for 1s instead.

Arlott charges at an enemy, dealing 135<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> (this skill cannot be interrupted during movement).
If Arlott's target is <font color="a6aafb">Marked</font>, this skill will deal double damage, immediately refresh its cooldown, and restore <font color="fba51f"> (+90% Total Physical Attack)</font> HP to Arlott (only restores 50% of that amount when used on a non-hero unit.)

Arlott cleaves in front of him, dealing 400<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to targets in the area while pushing them to the end of the AOE and briefly revealing their location.

data.name: Arlott

__data.skilldesc: For 3s, gain 35% <font color="62f8fe">Damage Reduction</font> and deal 35% <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> back to the attacker each time you receive damage.
__data.skilldesc_text: For <Num1>s, gain <%Num3> [C2Damage Reduction] and deal <%Num2> [C1Magic Damage] back to the attacker each time you receive damage.
__data.skilldescemblem: For 3s, gain 35% <font color="62f8fe">Damage Reduction</font> and deal 35% <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> back to the attacker each time you receive damage.

recommendmasterplan.description: Exp Lane: Balanced CD Reduction, damage, and survivability.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+10% Spell Vamp
+22 Adaptive Attack
+6 Extra Physical Defense
+6 Extra Magic Defense

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <Num1> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Penetration[-].########[8098ab]Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.[-]
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>

emblemskill.skilldesc: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by 15%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by 15%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers 5% of Max HP.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers <%Num1> of Max HP.########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num2>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers 5% of Max HP.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+18 Extra Magic Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1:
Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 12 extra Physical Attack per second for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Deals extra 10% True Damage based on the damage dealt (no damage reduction counted) at full stacks.
<font color="A4AAC7">Marksmen, Mages, and Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects</font>.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 12 extra Physical Attack per second for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Deals extra 10% True Damage based on the damage dealt (no damage reduction counted) at full stacks.
<font color="A4AAC7">Marksmen, Mages, and Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects</font>.
equiplist.equiptips:
+35 Extra Physical Attack
+400 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+12% Spell Vamp

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+500 Mana
+55 Extra Physical Defense
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+800 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1:
Thunderbolt: Every 4s, the next Basic Attack deals 50<font color="26e407"> (+1 Extra Physical Defense)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+1 Extra Magic Defense)</font> extra True Damage to the target and enemies around them, and briefly slows them by 99%. Hybrid Defense permanently increases by 1 each time the attack hits an enemy hero.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect is reduced to 50% for Marksmen and Mages.</font>

Hybrid Defense permanently increases by 1 each time the attack hits an enemy hero.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect is reduced to 50% for Marksmen and Mages.</font>

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.

+800 Extra Max HP

recommendmasterplan.name: TS - Kidbomba
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: A demon human hybrid wielding two lances with a thirst for vengeance against both the Church and demons.

assist.desc: Arlott works well with Tanks who can initiate with CC, such as Gatotkaca and Atlas. Their CC will also mark enemies for Arlott, allowing him to use his 2nd Skill even more for tons of damage.

strong.desc: Arlott counters Fighters with relatively lower HP, such as Sun and Zilong. Arlott can deal high burst damage and has excellent chasing and control abilities, allowing him to quickly eliminate more fragile Fighters.

weak.desc: Arlott is countered by tanky Fighters that can withstand lots of damage, like Thamuz and Fredrinn, because he lacks the burst to take them out quickly and will lose in a prolonged battle.
